original_title: Slam It! In A Young Whore
overview: Dave West from London's acclaimed Harmony Ltd directs another in the hardcore Slam It! series, starring fan favorite Sasha Grey and six other (mostly American) beauties. The rule of thumb is balls-out porn action; lots of blowjobbery, assfucking and other delights are indulged in by these stunning young whores.
title: Slam It! In A Young Whore
